Description.Text: The 4-star Somerset House Hotel and Restaurant offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Portsmouth. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature internet access â€“ wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as golf course (within 3 km). A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Somerset House Hotel and Restaurant.
